title: Chai Tea Powder

preparations.content: Place cardamom seeds, nutmeg, star anise, cloves, peppercorns and cinnamon sticks into mixing bowl and grind <b>30 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add powdered milk, ginger, tea leaves and sugar and grind <b>30 sec/speed 9<b>.
Transfer into an airtight jar and label with cooking instructions (see Tip).

hintsAndTricks: Stove top cooking instructions: place 2 tsp Chai Tea Powder in a tea ball or a tea bag. Heat 8 oz water until boiling. Allow tea ball to steep for 5-8 minutes. Serve immediately.
Thermomix cooking instructions: place 8 oz water and 2 tsp Chai Tea Powder into mixing bowl and cook <b>5 min/195°F/speed 3<b>. Strain and serve.
Allow to steep longer for a stronger tea.
